dataList.dlg: You, take point there. You, take the vanguard. And... oh, I suppose I don't need to order 'em around. Yeah, well... stay safe out there, boys.
Cheering someone in a fight don't count for shit. You won't survive a fight if you're not goin' in ready to lose some blood yourself. Just remember to stay sharp.
The boys aren't lookin' so good... Hah, it's all or nothing. No two ways about it.
What a shitshow... Hey, if I were you, I'd pull 'em back to live and fight another day.
So many holes in their defenses. Whack 'em quick and move on.
That's what happens when you let down your guard. Might wanna tell the boys to cover that one.
Takin' em out one by one, eh? Very nice. Well, then I'll... yawn. Maybe I'll go take a little nap.
Hm... Can't fret over every death. Don't forget to raise a drink to their names later, though.
Shit's lookin' pretty hopeless, huh... But hey, if you're in a Syndicate, you don't get to choose when to quit.
That's how strifes usually go... They always end with heavy losses on both sides. But we were always the one left standing in the end.
Stay on your toes. This might be your last chance, at least according to the order we received from the higher-ups.
What the... what the hell is that? It ain't something you see every day, that's for sure...!
I can hear you wrackin' your brain all the way from here... Don't try to think through this problem, got that? Feel your way through it instead.
You're cuttin' through 'em like soft konnyaku. All it takes is a little slice.
The hell are you… haah… doing...? You don't use a sword to chop down a tree trunk, do ya? Use the right tools for the job, ya knuckleheads.
Where'd that one come from? Nice skills. I like it...
This is really getting on my nerves... Don't tell me you half-assed their training?
They look... motivated. Their boss must've lit fire under their asses.
They look like shit. Where's the fun in beating up a bunch of sad sacks like 'em?

Ohh, yeah. Once we get through this shit, it's gonna be a drinkin' night! Ha, look at your faces, you're all practically beaming.
... Oh, I ain't buying, though.
Hmm... You're all getting on my nerves...! C'mon, get your shits together!
Hah! Nice chop. What are ya gonna hit us with now, asshole?
Your boys know what they're doing. They know this enemy ain't one to be beaten by rushing in blindly; cutting its arms and legs off will make things much easier.
Dammit... How was I supposed to read that? Fall back!
Looks like they've got some heavy hitters of their own... Alright, focus on recovery for now. Haah... We're gonna have to think this through...
Oh? Hey, not bad. Whew... you've got some potential. Wanna go grab a drink with me later?
Ah, nice one... Yeah, that one knows what they're doin'. Not bad, not bad at all.
Goddamn... That... hmph, that reminds me of our Patriarch who's gone East.

Yaaawn... Didya really have to come to me for this shit when I've got plenty of subordinates lyin' around doing nothing? ... Tsk, fine. I'll go and teach 'em a thing or two about the rules of the Backstreets.
